name: mriss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

stmt.origin: simprbda(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, c0), cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))))))
stmt.pretty: simprbda(c0 ∈(Moore ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, c2 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0 ∈((mrCls ` c0)`(c2 \ { hs0 }))))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

stmt.origin: ismri(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cmrc, c0))
stmt.pretty: ismri(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (mrCls ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, c0), cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))))))))
-| wceq(cfv(cmrc, c0), cfv(cmrc, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmri, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Moore ` c1)→(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0 ∈((mrCls ` c0)`(c2 \ { hs0 }))))))
⊣ (mrCls ` c0)=(mrCls ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(mrInd ` c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c2)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmri, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)

comment: An independent set of a Moore system is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
